Metadata.Title: CVE-2023-37920 affecting package python-certifi for versions less than 2023.05.07-1.cm2
Metadata.Description: CVE-2023-37920 affecting package python-certifi for versions less than 2023.05.07-1.cm2. A patched version of the package is available.

Criterion.Comment: Package python-certifi is earlier than 2023.05.07-1.cm2, affected by CVE-2023-37920
